snippet: Federal authorities trying to settle civil rights allegations against Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County said Tuesday that his office had negotiated in bad faith and risked ending settlement talks.
abstract: Federal authorities trying to settle civil rights allegations against Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Ariz, say his office negotiated in bad faith and risks ending settlement talks.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities trying to settle civil rights allegations against Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County said Tuesday that his office had negotiated in bad faith and risked ending settlement talks.

headline.seo: Joe Arpaio Accused of Bad-Faith Negotiations
headline.main: Arizona: Sheriff Is Accused of Bad-Faith Negotiations
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Sheriff Is Accused of Bad-Faith Negotiations
